name: Ultimate Muscle Roller Championship
description:
Combine wrestling, gym and cars in this incredible racing championship among the most muscular BOYS from around the world! Pass all the stages and earn the honorary title of BOSS OF THE GYM and THREE HUNDRED BUCKS with your sweat, blood and... other fluids!

The championship consists of five stages, in each of which you have to visit a separate corner of the familiar universe and take part in an elimination race! The last participant to arrive leaves the championship, gets SIX HOT LOADS and adds to your collection of SLAVES!

Features:

  • For the first time in history - unique atmosphere of wrestling comes to race
  • All cult characters are back! Choose your favorite and go with him to the end
  • Many right vehicles, you will be happy with BOY NEXT DOOR
  • A variety of locations inspired by the adventures of heroes
  • Character customization system, thanks to which you can recreate Sergeant Billy Herrington, Santa Claus Van Darkholme and many other unusual characters
  • Gachi car customization system, replace ordinary dumbbells with fashionable emerald disks with dollars
  • Right version for real men and censored for the faint of heart
  • Drive music for hot races, with the ability to upload your own
  • Control the car with one hand and feel free to do anything

Don't forget to:
